app.name: TestMiiInternet
app.short_description: A basic Wii Internet Speed Test.
app.long_description:
Measures download and upload speeds and ping rate on the Nintendo Wii.
Tests ping to Google.com, tests download rate to GitHub, and tests upload rate to file.io. Runs multiple tests, averages result!
Application may start with a black screen, this is normal on Real Hardware. Internet Speeds on real hardware are expected to be REALLY slow, less than 5mpbs on average. Please account for this.
github.com/kniterite-studios/testmiiinternet
